HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: |This is initial beta release of Combat Extended Aimbot. |Please report any encountered bugs to special bug report thread on steam page. Provide as much information as you can. If I won't be able to reproduce it - odds are I won't be able to fix it.

From now on pawns will automatically switch their fire and aim mod for most guns (some unique guns won't be affected). If you want to switch into manual mode for certain pawn - just toggle aim or fire mode yourself and Aimbot will be disabled and special button will be created, so you can turn it back on.|img:EnableAimbotGizmo
